segments.text: Yes . I am going to have a summer vacation . Would you recommend some scenic spots to see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which place are you most interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I strongly suggest you going to London . It's really charming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me have a look at the pamphlet .
segments.speaker: S2
